backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing inquiries and user profiles with admin and user authorization, supporting submission, retrieval, update, and deletion of inquiries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking admin dashboard behavior to related frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of each major frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark mode OKLCH color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML shell loading the React frontend and mounting the app at the root element.
frontend/PREVIEW_VALIDATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist for validating preview deployments to ensure backend and UI function correctly before production.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Detailed production smoke test covering login flow, admin dashboard behavior, inquiry management, and error recovery steps.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that preserves the requested path in sessionStorage before redirecting to the root for client-side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Static HTML entry point for the admin section loading the same SPA bundle as the main app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling routing, deep-link restoration, admin access guard, and rendering public or admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Supplies perâ€‘inquiry admin actions for marking read/unread and deleting, plus bulk export utilities for JSON and CSV.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Displays and filters inquiries with search, type/category filters, and bulk read/unread actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: A modal login dialog for officials with credential input, validation, error display, and success callback.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Simple logo component displaying the Vaishnavi brand image in configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary showing a Hindi error UI with reset button and minimal diagnostic info.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with business info, disclaimer, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Provides a validated inquiry submission form supporting contact and service requests, with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, section scrolling, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section showing address, operator, phone, and WhatsApp links using siteContent values.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Displays a contact form section with a header and InquiryForm inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Shows the hero banner with business name, tagline, call/WhatsApp buttons, location, and an admin login dialog.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists all service categories and items from siteContent as cards in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Displays reasons to choose the business using icons and text pulled from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Exports all static business content including hero text, services, reasons, and footer notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Handles admin-specific actor creation with token-based initialization, retry logic, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Fetches all admin inquiries using the admin actor with self-healing, retries, and guarded query enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, initializing AuthClient, handling login state, and exposing identity and login controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialAdminToken: Reads and tracks an admin token from sessionStorage, updating state on custom auth-change and storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Implements simple official admin login using hardcoded credentials, storing session state and token, and syncing changes via events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting inquiries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page handling login gating, admin actor initialization, inquiry fetching, error handling, and UI rendering.
frontend/src/utils/adminError.ts: Utility for extracting readable error messages and categorizing admin-related errors such as authorization or replica issues.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Exports inquiries as JSON or CSV, formatting timestamps and safely escaping CSV fields.
frontend/src/utils/navigation.ts: Provides a helper for SPA navigation by updating history and dispatching popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read URL parameters (query and hash), store and retrieve them from sessionStorage, and manage persisted URL parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, container settings, animations, and integrating typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Snapshot of project configuration describing site purpose, admin login requirements, architectural notes, and known issues with admin dashboard and deployment.
